definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: one of David's heroes 2Sa 23:36 [[בָּנִי הַגׇּדִי]] (‖ 1Ch 11:38 has [[בֶּן־הַגְרִי]], but v. Dr:Sm).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ne 3:17 cf. Ne 8:7 (= [[בִּנּוּי]] Ne 10:10) Ne 9:4, Ne 9:4 (repeated prob. by error, cf. BeRy) v:Ne 9:5, Ne 10:14, Ne 11:22. On Ezr 2:40 = Ne 7:43 cf. Gr:Gesch. ii. 2, 389; he reads [[קדמיאל בני]] for [[קדמיאל לבני]], taking [[בני]] as n.pr., as 3 Ezr 5:26 Kadmihlou kai\ Bannou.
a man of Judah 1Ch 9:4 ([[מִן]]) [[בָּנִי]] Qr ( > Kt [[בנימן]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Ezr 10:34 but perh. rd. [[בִּנּוּי]] or [[בִּגְּוַי]] cf. supr.
an Israelite Ezr 10:38.—([[בני]] as n.pr. Palm Vog:No. 94.)
